name: UnassignPhoneNumber
description:
Unassign [phone number](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020808292-Managing-Phone-Numbers#h_38ba8b01-26e3-4b1b-a9b5-0717c00a7ca6) of a Zoom phone user.
After assigning a phone number, you can remove it if you don't want it to be assigned to anyone. **Scopes**: `phone:write` `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
**Prerequisite:** 1. Business or Enterprise account 2. A Zoom Phone license 3. User must have been previously assigned a Zoom Phone number.

userId.description: Provide either userId or email address of the user.

phoneNumberId.description: Provide either phone number or phoneNumberId of the user.
